name: Rewind the MIXTAPE
description:
This is the Gam Jam Entry for Brackeys 2020.2.
You are the speaker who lives in the world of cassettes. The people need music and you have to pick up the notes so the song can go on. But you also have the power to rewind the tape, so you won't fall off the tape. And be careful, dust is everywhere!


Mouse for moving
You can move the speaker (player) with the help of your mouse. The speaker goes towards the mouse. And if the mouse is further away from the speaker, the faster he will move towards the mouse.

Leftclick for rewind the music
Rightclick  for jump

Hint: You can make long jumps when you rewind and jump immediately after landing!

Music credits:

Call The Shots  - Slynk
Golden Empire  - The 126ers
Book The Rental Wit It  - RAGE

Because of a restriction in Unity WebGL the sound wont be played reversed as it should be. It will only play slower instead of reverse. To get the full and correct experience try out one of standalone builds.
